      static Logger logger 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BPMNScanner()
      The Camunda API's method "getimplementation" doesn't return the correct Implementation, so the we have to scan the xml of the model for the implementation

    • Constructor Detail

      • BPMNScanner

        public BPMNScanner()
            throws ParserConfigurationException
        The Camunda API's method "getimplementation" doesn't return the correct Implementation, so the we have to scan the xml of the model for the implementation
        Throws:
        ParserConfigurationException - exception if document cant be parsed

    • Method Detail

      • getImplementation

        public String getImplementation(String path,
                                String id)
                         throws SAXException,
                                IOException,
                                ParserConfigurationException
        Return the Implementation of an specific element (sendTask, ServiceTask or BusinessRuleTask)
        Parameters:
        path - path to model
        id - id of bpmn element
        Returns:
        return_implementation contains implementation
        Throws:
        SAXException - possible exception while process xml
        IOException - possible exception if file not found
        ParserConfigurationException - possible exception if file could not be parsed
